timeline.message: Issue #7737: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - InvalidJavadocPosition

timeline.bodyText:
"RuntimeException" I guess this is leftover of copy-pasting from other issue.
Please correct here and below.
timeline.author: strkkk

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/it/java/org/checkstyle/suppressionxpathfilter/XpathRegressionInvalidJavadocPositionTest.java b/src/it/java/org/checkstyle/suppressionxpathfilter/XpathRegressionInvalidJavadocPositionTest.java
index 6abd3116e..b11f5ce32 100644
--- a/src/it/java/org/checkstyle/suppressionxpathfilter/XpathRegressionInvalidJavadocPositionTest.java
+++ b/src/it/java/org/checkstyle/suppressionxpathfilter/XpathRegressionInvalidJavadocPositionTest.java

@@ -47,7 +47,7 @@ public class XpathRegressionInvalidJavadocPositionTest extends AbstractXpathTest
 
         final String[] expectedViolation = {
             "4:1: " + getCheckMessage(InvalidJavadocPositionCheck.class,
-                InvalidJavadocPositionCheck.MSG_KEY, "RuntimeException"),
+                InvalidJavadocPositionCheck.MSG_KEY),
         };
 
         final List<String> expectedXpathQueries = Collections.singletonList(

timeline.message: Issue #7737: Update AbstractChecks to log DetailAST - InvalidJavadocPosition

timeline.bodyText:
You are giving the file name as SuppressionXpathRegressionInvalidJavaDocPositionOne but the actual file name is SuppressionXpathRegressionInvalidJavadocPositionFive.
CI is right and your file names are wrong and that is why it says it can't find them.
timeline.author: rnveach
